about_the_game:
The Mines of White Label

With one of the largest companies in the kingdom collapsing and the entire region on the brink of economic disaster, there is only one thing you can do.
CAPITALIZE.

With the guidance of your trusty mentors and a sturdy hammer, build an empire by selling pre made companies to aspiring entrepreneurs and financial tycoons. Each client will have different needs for a fully functioning company so use your business sense to make a product fit for purpose. Don't let bankruptcy get in the way.

The Hammer

Ya know, a hammer can be used for more than just nails. Defeat your enemies, construct mines and fill out paperwork all with a single swing.

The Mine

Employees are the family that you choose so you better choose well. Grow relationships with dwarfs to find out how they tick and train them up to be the best hecking dwarves in the kingdom. As long as you take care of them, they will take care of you.

The Office

You never feel more at home than in the office, so make it the best darn home you can. Customize it to ensure maximum comfort for your dwarfs and improve it, so that you don't have to do the tasks that you aren't a fan of. Because why approve shipments when you can have fun with taxes instead!

name: The Mines of White Label
short_description: If you want a good outcome, you need a good income. One of the largest companies in the kingdom has fallen into liquidation. Use your trusty hammer and the gap in the market to fight your way to the top.
